import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import userService from "../services/userService"; // ‚úÖ import service // ‚úÖ Import CSS, Font, Bootstrap import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "../assets/fonts/fontawesome/css/all.min.css"; // ‚úÖ Import h√¨nh ·∫£nh import logo from "../assets/images/logo.png"; import flagVN from "../assets/images/icons/flags/VN.webp"; const Header = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const [displayName, setDisplayName] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); // ‚úÖ L·∫•y user t·ª´ localStorage useEffect(() => { const storedUser = localStorage.getItem("user"); if (storedUser) { try { const parsedUser = JSON.parse(storedUser); setUser(parsedUser); // ‚úÖ N·∫øu c√≥ userId th√¨ g·ªçi API ƒë·ªÉ l·∫•y t√™n ƒë·∫ßy ƒë·ªß if (parsedUser.userId) { userService .getUserById(parsedUser.userId) .then((res) => { const u = res.data; const fullName = `${u.firstName || ""} ${u.lastName || ""}`.trim(); setDisplayName(fullName || u.email); }) .catch((err) => console.error("‚ùå L·ªói l·∫•y th√¥ng tin user:", err)); } } catch (error) { console.error("‚ùå Parse user l·ªói:", error); } } }, []); // ‚úÖ ƒêƒÉng xu·∫•t const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("user"); localStorage.removeItem("token"); setUser(null); setDisplayName(""); navigate("/login"); }; return (
